participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, Emily has a calming presence. She's dedicated and responsible, often putting others before herself.
participant_1.background: my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i walk three miles every day. i'm a baby delivery nurse. i love to spend time with my family.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, Jake enjoys trying new things and is always up for a challenge, yet he maintains a chill demeanor.
participant_2.background: my favourite music is country music. i drive a nissan pathfinder. i've short brown hair. i'm a convenience store manager.
